name: Abra Collabra
description:
This game was made by members of an online game development community. Participants submitted a scene based on a template to be included in the project. 

Credits for the rooms can be found in the last room of the game.

Special thanks to Geo3D, Svetliaka and Diannara for helping organize the project and contributing to the template.

To participate in the next project, say "hi" or let us know you're interested in the daily game dev streams: twitch.tv/Lana_Lux
